jobActivity.title: Dynaimcs 365 CRM business Analysis position
jobActivity.body:
followup requires for the followin position: https://www.jobserve.com/gb/en/search-jobs-in-City-of-London,-London,-United-Kingdom/MICROSOFT-DYNAMICS-365-CRM-BUSINESS-ANALYST-6E4A6A25ADEBB6407E/
He is unresponsive...give a last chance.
Below is all communicatiom heistory with James through LinkedIn
Muhammet Atalay 9:13 AM Hello James,
I am interested in Microsoft Dynamics CRM Functional Consultant position in totaljobs (87018753) thus, I have just applied to the https://www.totaljobs.com/job/dynamics-crm-consultant/montash-job87018753
please do not hesitate to contact me in case of any queries
regards, Muhammet ATALAY
JUL 8 James Doidge sent the following message at 1:11 PM View James’ profile James Doidge James Doidge 1:11 PM Hi Muhammet, Thanks for your application, however, the client is no longer hiring for this role. Are you still looking for work?
James
Muhammet Atalay sent the following messages at 1:13 PM View Muhammet’s profile Muhammet Atalay Muhammet Atalay 1:13 PM Hello James, Sorry to hear that.
I am actively looking for a contract in CRM
Regards Muhammet
TUESDAY View Muhammet’s profile Muhammet Atalay Muhammet Atalay 9:14 PM Hello James, how are you?
I have met your advertisement in following link: https://job-openings.monster.co.uk/dynamics-365-crm-technical-consultant-city-of-london-london-uk-montash-limited/210803501
may i speak with you about the contract opportunity?
I will be very happy to talk to you tomorrow till noon if possible,
thanks a lot.
regards, Muhammet...
Dynamics 365 CRM Technical Consultant - Montash Limited job-openings.monster.co.uk Complete the job application for Dynamics 365 CRM Technical Consultant in City of London, London onl… Seen by James Doidge at 1565123555832.
